package.name: Darkify
package.shortDescription: Darkify is a dark theme for all iOS devices that keeps all icons fimiliar looking but with a dark grey gradient and adds a bit more depth to the icons.

descriptionlist.description: Darkify is a dark theme for all iOS devices that keeps all icons fimiliar looking but with a dark grey gradient and adds a bit more depth to the icons. There are over 130+ icons and counting!
